channel.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
channel.description:
What are your least favorite enemies in videogames?
My top 3:
1. HECU from HL. They have lots of health, do lots of damage and are waay to numerous in HL 2. Those silent ninja guys from F.E.A.R, they're scary. 3. Spike Bass from New Super Mario Bros. They're easy, but damn they're intimidating. This is a pic ![](upload://mcAJzO06ucK0CMOc69kDNQBpEMH.png) It doesn't look intimidating, but they are when you play it if you don't have a fire flower.
Post yours!

item.description:

item.source: Your least favorite enemies in videogames

item.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
item.dc:creator: Debdibib
item.description:
1. I hate basically all enemies in the Penumbra series, its so hard to fight them.(otherwise it is some of the best games i have ever played, check it out)
  2. the Devil in GH3 is a pain in the ass too(at least on expert and hard).
  3. hobbe mages in fable are probably my most haded foes.
  4. cars in Far Cry 2, always faster than yours and always trying to roadkill you if on foot.
  5. sneaky snorks in stalker.
  6. quick scoping AI in Arma 2 Arrowhead, better than most mw2 nerds(meaning u play mw2 more than 40h a week, and don’t totally suck).

thats what i can think of right now.

Read full topic
item.source: Your least favorite enemies in videogames

item.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Your welcome.

Anyways, Lakitus from Super Mario Bros. are quite possibly the worst videogame mechanic ever. They are incredibly hard to kill, and there’s basicly no reward if you kill one. They just keep coming back, and throw Spinies at you.

Read full topic

item.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
Mr.Shadow:

Pick up a shotgun, go up behind her and aim for the bum.

Seriously? I was aiming for her head. Okay, I’ll try it ("aim for the bum, then run like hell). Got It! Thanks!

item.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
item.dc:creator: smileyman
item.description:
Quote:
Originally Posted by smileyman
Baby headcrabs ,female assassins and alien controllers from Half-Life 1,
Tanks and smokers from Left 4 Dead,
Antlions from Half-Life 2,
Shock troopers from Opposing Force,
Awp users in Counter-Strike that comes frome corners by jumping and headshot you while jumping just 0.10 seconds after they saw you ,even if you were ducking ,jumping or running as hell…
More explanation here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HAWaGJgN1KU

And cheaters of course
And 10 years old cheaters that says that having an headshot script is not cheating
What about enemies from non-valve games

About non-valve games ,I play Gears of War, and I shoot at locusts because I hate them rather than I find it funny.

Read full topic

item.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
CTID:

Especially when you’re a kid and the fire ones burn your shield if they touch it.

Just use your slingshot/bow on them, or sword if they’re close enough.

But there’s always like 4 or 5 and they all attack you at once.

Okay, instead of just annoying enemies, the enemy that seriously scares me (the most) are the witches in L4D. Did you ever “crown a witch”? I’m still trying :aah: :FFFUUU:

item.description:
My new worst enemy… the falling debri in Episode 1 on the elevator ride… I dont know why, but I ALWAYS seem to have trouble with it… FIrst couple times I played it, I used to think you had to grab a energy ball and hit it with it and make it go flying… Citadel debri = my arch nemesis.

item.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
item.dc:creator: HEV_Technician_Delta
item.description:
Pokemon Eater:

ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL + Insanity difficulty. 'Nuff said.

Oh please, Harbinger wasn’t that bad. Then again, I did play a chickenshit Infiltrator with maxed out cloaking. Shit, that ability is like playing with NoClip on.

Though I’ll agree the Scions where a right pain in the balls. Motherfuckers blasting me out of cover I swear, I ought-ASSUMING CONTROL OF THIS FORM

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
-^^^These assholes from F.E.A.R. 2, they scared the shit outta me…

-Flood tank form from Halo 3

-Black ops from Half Life

-Spetsnaz (or whatever it’s spelled) from MW and MW2

-Terran siege tank from Starcraft

-Poison zombies from Half Life 2

-Templar brutes from Assassins Creed 2

-And the worst of all:

:fffuuu::fffuuu::fffuuu:

item.title: Your least favorite enemies in videogames
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
All the enemies in the King’s Quest series.

Hm, I wonder which LAKE I’m supposed to THROW this BABY into.

<There is a giant on the next screen. It immediately notices you, and walks toward you faster than you can move>
You have been eaten by a giant! Thank you for playing King’s Quest IV.

It’s even worse with staircases.
You have fallen off the staircase due to your inability to recognize more than 4 directions that are solely relative to the camera. Would you like to load one of the previous 16 save games you’ve made trying to climb this staircase?

Read full topic
